awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Cotype of Operators Between Banach   Spaces and Rademacher Processes
awd_abstract_narration: Professor Montgomery-Smith will conduct research into the                  study of the cotype 2 constant of operators from C(K) to any                    Banach space.  This is intended to fill a gap on what is already                known about how cotype 2 relates to operators from C(K) which has               so far dealt only with operators which factor through a space of                cotype 2.  This research will involve the study of Rademacher                   processes.  This is a recent but very natural area.  It takes as                its starting point the well studied Gaussian processes.                              This research is at the interface of two fields: probability               and operator theory on infinite dimensional spaces.  Properties                 of operators (infinite dimensional matrices) are studied using                  ideas from probability and conversely the quest to understand                   these operators leads to new and interesting questions in pure                  probability.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
